(n : ℕ)
(hn : n > 0)
(f : ℕ → ℂ → ℂ)
(hf : ∀ z : ℂ, f n z = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i)
: ∀ z : ℂ, ‖z‖ ≤ 1 → f n z ≠ 0 := by

  have h₃ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i := rfl

  have h₅ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i ≠ 0 := by

    simp_all [Finset.mem_range]

  intro z hz
  have h₁ : f n z = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i := by rw [hf]

  have h₂ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i = 0 := by simpa using h
  have h₃ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i := rfl
  have h₄ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i := rfl
  -- Use the fact that the sum of non-negative terms is zero only when each term is zero
  have h₅ : ∀ i ∈ Finset.range n, (n - i) * z^i = 0 := by
    intro i hi
    have h₆ : z^i = z^i := rfl

    <;> aesop
